parameters: \unknown\lspi[60]Who dares disrupt our plans?!\| Come out here and face me,\.\.\. coward!
\lyonLooks like their ringleader's come out to play... I think it's about time I end this.
\lyonI shouldn't leave yet,\. there are still bandits sneaking around here.
\n<Doubtful Bandit>\msgevent[18]What's this?\.\. A foolish boy tryna' play hero?\.\.
I'll show ya, kid.\. Ain't nothin' but a pipedream.
\lyonA hero?\.\. No one has given you the memo about me,\. have they?
\n<Doubtful Bandit>\msgevent[18]Memo?\. Kid,\. think I care about the politics of this useless town?\| Your memos\. and your memo\.ries\. too,\. might I add,\. are all 'bout to perish in flames.
\lyonWill they now?\.\. Let's see if you can back up your words.
\n<Mistaken Bandit>\msgevent[18]Impossible!\| Can't believe this\..\..\.. is even\..\..\.. possible\..\..\..
\n<Reassured Bandit>\msgevent[18]Just as I thought.\.\. Ain't even worth my time.\.\. Go home, brat! \|If you even have one left to go back to!\| Ha\. ha \.ha!
\n<Doubtful Bandit>\msgevent[18]Back for more, huh?  I quite enjoy torturing you!
\n<Mistaken Bandit>\msgevent[18]Impossible!\| Can't believe this\..\..\.. is even \..\..\.. possible\..\..\..
\n<Reassured Bandit>\msgevent[18]Just as I thought. \ Ain't even worth my time.\|  Go home, brat!  \.\.If you even have one left to go back to!\.\. Ha\. ha \.ha!
\n<Prideful Bandit>\msgevent[20]You wanna end up like that old man there? \.\.Best beat it before it's too late!\.\.  Nothing can even touch me!
\lyonYou talk a lot,\. but I guess it's fine since you won't be talking much soon.
\n<Disbelieving Bandit>\msgevent[20]I can't believe you've done this!
\n<Reassured Bandit>\msgevent[20]And you actually thought you could win?\| Get out of my sight.
\n<Prideful Bandit>\msgevent[18]Don't know when to quit,\. huh?
\n<Disbelieving Bandit>\msgevent[20]I can't believe you've done this!
\n<Reassured Bandit>\msgevent[20]We can do this ALL\| DAY!
\unknown\lspi[70]\msgevent[20]This?\.\. This is who is causing such a ruckus?\.\.Pathetic.\|Make quick work of him, men.

\lyonThat was a bit rough.
\|But, I can't just sit here, I need to catch that ringleader! He went towards the east side of town.
\unknown\lspi[70]\msgevent[20]This?\.\. This is who is causing such a ruckus?\.\.Pathetic.\|Make quick work of him, men.
